testimonials_list.name: Valentin Melchior
testimonials_list.text: Jordan is committed to his work and highly adaptable. He was able to apply his social and technical skills during his end-of-study internship to tackle a wide range of issues, in a cross-functional management position with many different contacts.

details: Internal audit and complete automation of business processes.
Development of a banking-specific LLM model.
Creation of a 'tool-box' to automate daily tasks.
Implementation of a performance scorecard for management.
Creation and development of KPeye, independent structure specialized in data analytics.
Performance audits (web, sales, operations).
Dashboard design (Power BI, Looker Studio, Excel).
Business process optimization via workflow automation.
Strategic support for data-driven decision making.
Data analyst for management (digital transformation).
Monthly presentation of results to 5 sub-departments.
Consolidation of 10+ data sources (SQL, ETL, SharePoint).
Continuous support for 70+ business users on Power BI.
Creation of 20+ reports focused on HR, Finance, Safety, Project, Scorecard.
Mastery of Google Analytics 4, Tag Manager, Data Studio, Google ADS.
Script creation in JavaScript or Python.
Autonomous management of a client portfolio (approx. 20).
Development of project management tools (Notion, Make automation).
Mastery of Store Commander and Prestashop.
Mastery of analysis tools (SQL, Google Analytics).
Adaptation to a just-in-time system.
Mastery of data extraction and results transcription.

pedagogy.title: Why Tokenize?
pedagogy.subtitle: Traditional finance is slow and expensive. Tokenization is the future.
pedagogy.you_want_buy: You want to buy 1 fund share.
pedagogy.token_desc: Imagine a digital casino chip, but unforgeable. It represents your property title. Instead of a paper at a notary, you have this token in your phone.
pedagogy.blockchain_desc: It's a large shared notebook that everyone can read but no one can erase. It's trust through technology, no need to trust a central bank.
pedagogy.smart_contract_def: A robot-notary that automatically executes rules (payments, dividends) without human intervention.
pedagogy.business_model_title: If fees are removed, how does the Bank make money?
pedagogy.volume_desc: Today, selling a fund at €100 costs too much. Tomorrow, the bank can sell millions of shares at €100.
pedagogy.volume_highlight: Less margin per client, but 100x more clients.
pedagogy.tech_jobs_desc: Manual jobs disappear in favor of high value-added jobs: Structuring, Custody, Code Audit.
pedagogy.margin_desc: Even if revenue drops slightly, operational costs collapse (-40% to -60%).
pedagogy.registry_token: Immutable and transparent Ledger. Update T+0.

tokenization.page_subtitle: High-fidelity prototype demonstrating asset management transformation via Blockchain.
tokenization.modal_invest_prompt: How many shares do you want to acquire?
tokenization.modal_sell_prompt: How many shares do you want to sell?
tokenization.alert_report_downloaded: The complete audit report has been downloaded.
tokenization.title: My Portfolio
tokenization.log_buy_success: Buy order of {{amount}} shares executed on blockchain.
tokenization.log_sell_success: Sell order of {{amount}} shares executed. Cash received.
tokenization.admin_desc: This view simulates the <1>Fund Administrator</1> interface (Asset Manager).
tokenization.public_desc: The transaction ledger (Blockchain) is visible to everyone.
tokenization.private_desc: Share management and report generation are restricted to authorized personnel.

footer.description: Expert in Business Intelligence and Automation. I transform complex data into clear strategic decisions.

projects.title: My <1>Projects</1>
projects.subtitle: A selection of my most ambitious work. From financial automation to applied artificial intelligence.

elliev.title: Public Opinion Scanner
elliev.context: "Companies make decisions based on feelings, not facts."
elliev.fullDesc: The problem today isn't finding information, it's filtering it. Ellie V doesn't just search specifically for keywords on Twitter or TikTok. It reads, understands, and scores the emotion behind every post to tell a brand: 'Warning, a crisis is brewing' or 'Your product is loved'.

tokenization-platform.title: Real Estate 2.0 (Blockchain)
tokenization-platform.context: "Why does it take 3 months to buy an apartment and 3 seconds to buy Apple stock?"
tokenization-platform.fullDesc: This prototype demonstrates how to cut out middlemen (banks, notaries) in real estate fund management. By transforming fund shares into 'Tokens', we enable 24/7 trading, total transparency, and fees divided by ten.

job-monitor.title: AI Job Hunter
job-monitor.context: "Spending 2 hours a day scrolling LinkedIn is not a career strategy."
job-monitor.fullDesc: Instead of me looking for jobs, jobs come to me. This bot scans multiple platforms, filters out 'fake' listings, and sends only those that are a 95% match for my profile directly to Discord.

algo-trading.title: Stock Market Autopilot
algo-trading.context: "Emotion is the investor's number one enemy."
algo-trading.fullDesc: A system that manages a US portfolio completely autonomously. It analyzes trends, takes positions in the morning, and closes in the evening. No fatigue, no panic, just cold, disciplined execution of a mathematical strategy.

tiktok-automation.title: Automated Video Producer
tiktok-automation.fullDesc: A Python script that acts like a mini-production agency: it finds a trending topic on Reddit, writes a script, generates a voiceover, edits the video with background gameplay, and publishes to TikTok. 0 human intervention.

kpeye-dashboard.title: Financial Cockpit
kpeye-dashboard.context: "An unreadable dashboard is as useless as a car without a windshield."
kpeye-dashboard.fullDesc: Ultra-clean management interface for executives. Transforms indigestible Excel sheets into 4 key indicators that let you know in 30 seconds if the company is doing well or not.

dashboards.title: Dashboards <1>Examples</1>
dashboards.subtitle: A collection of data visualization interfaces and interactive dashboards.
dashboards.power_bi_desc: This space is reserved for the integration of interactive Power BI reports. Dashboards will be connected in real-time to data sources.
dashboards.blockchain_desc: Visualizing the immutable journey of a product through the supply chain.

job_monitor.title: Job <1>Monitor</1>
job_monitor.subtitle: Live Feed • AI Matching Engine Active

discord_banner.title: Interactive Demo
discord_banner.description: This page is a simulation. The real bot runs 24/7 on my private Discord server, scanning thousands of job offers in real-time.

trading.title: Trading Portfolio
trading.subtitle: Live Market Data • Alpaca API Connected

header.title: Autonomous <1>Trading</1> Dashboard
header.realtime_desc: Real-time data from Alpaca Markets (Read-Only Mode)
header.simulation_desc: Live simulation of personal asset management strategies.

elliev.title: Competitive Intelligence & E-Reputation
elliev.shortDesc: Monitor your brand and competitors in real-time with sentiment analysis.
elliev.fullDesc: A complete strategic monitoring platform. You define your brand and competitors, and the tool continuously analyzes social media chatter. It detects sentiment (positive/negative) around your products and instantly alerts you to major competitor news.
elliev.context: Brands drown in noise. Missing a bad buzz or a key trend can be fatal.
elliev.challenge: Aggregating highly unstable disparate sources (Social Media APIs) while ensuring a clean and relevant feed without duplicates.
elliev.solution: Multi-Source Aggregator Architecture + NLP Filtering Pipeline.

tokenization-platform.title: Investment Democratization
tokenization-platform.shortDesc: Opening exclusive investment to the public through tokenization.
tokenization-platform.fullDesc: This educational project demonstrates how blockchain can make exclusive investment funds accessible to everyone. By 'tokenizing' a fund, we fragment the entry ticket, allowing anyone to invest small amounts in premium assets.
tokenization-platform.context: To prove that replacing traditional banking infrastructure (silos, T+3 delays) with tokenized infrastructure results in a faster, transparent, and profitable system.
tokenization-platform.challenge: Settlement delays (T+2 / T+3), Opacity & Data Silos, High administrative costs, and High entry barriers.
tokenization-platform.solution: Atomic Settlement (T+0), Shared Ledger (DLT) for transparency, Smart Contracts for automation, and Fractionalization for accessibility.

job-monitor.title: 24/7 Job Search Assistant
job-monitor.shortDesc: Stop searching: the tool scans 30 sites for you to find the perfect matches.
job-monitor.fullDesc: No more wasting time scrolling through dozens of career sites. This bot works for you 24/7: it monitors about thirty platforms, filters offers that exactly match your profile, and lets you apply immediately. A massive time-saver for your career.
job-monitor.context: The fragmentation of the job market forces candidates to manually monitor dozens of sites, wasting precious time.
job-monitor.challenge: Industrialize scraping on protected sites (LinkedIn, Indeed) while maintaining isolated sessions for each user.
job-monitor.solution: Master-Slave architecture generating dynamic Node.js scripts on the fly. Intelligent queue system and proxy rotation for undetectability.

algo-trading.title: Automated Trading
algo-trading.shortDesc: An algorithm that manages your investments with the cold discipline of a machine.
algo-trading.fullDesc: This trading robot manages your money following a rigorous mathematical strategy. It buys when the trend is strong and automatically sells before the market collapses. It removes the emotional factor (fear/greed) to secure stable long-term performance.
algo-trading.context: Manual investment often fails due to lack of emotional discipline in the face of volatility and trend reversals.
algo-trading.challenge: Capture the explosiveness of growth assets (Tech/Crypto) while guaranteeing an automatic and cold exit before stock market crashes.
algo-trading.solution: Pipeline 'Screener -> Filter -> Execute'. Use of trend filters (SMA), correlation matrices for selection, and server-side Trailing Stops orders to secure profits (Let Winners Run).

tiktok-automation.title: Viral Content Creator
tiktok-automation.shortDesc: An autonomous production studio that turns news into TikTok videos.
tiktok-automation.fullDesc: Why spend hours editing? This system spots tech news, writes an engaging script, generates a voiceover, finds images, edits the video, and publishes it to TikTok. All without a single human click. It is total content creation automation.
tiktok-automation.context: Creating 'Short-Form' content requires exhausting regularity and responsiveness for a human creator.
tiktok-automation.challenge: Automate video editing (usually manual and creative) while keeping a captivating narrative and visual consistency.
tiktok-automation.solution: Creative ETL Pipeline: Scraping -> LLM Analysis (Viral Score) -> Asset Generation -> Programmatic Editing (MoviePy) -> Upload API.

auto-stream.title: Smart Video Editor
auto-stream.shortDesc: An AI that watches Twitch for you and extracts the best moments in one click.
auto-stream.fullDesc: No more watching 5 hours of replay to find a nugget. This AI analyzes the audio and video of Twitch streams to detect moments of excitement (laughter, shouting, action). It automatically cuts these moments and formats them into vertical video for social networks.
auto-stream.context: Video editors spend hours watching replays to find 30 interesting seconds.
auto-stream.challenge: Develop a 'brain' capable of objectively understanding what a viral moment is without relying solely on chat, by analyzing sound and visual energy.
auto-stream.solution: Sequential Pipeline: Streamlink Capture -> Audio Analysis (Librosa) & Vision (OpenCV) -> Viral Composite Scoring -> Intelligent FFmpeg Cropping.

sports-arbitrage.title: Opportunity Scanner
sports-arbitrage.shortDesc: A tool that spots bookmaker price errors for guaranteed wins.
sports-arbitrage.fullDesc: This scanner compares sports betting odds at lightning speed to find mathematical anomalies (Surebets). It identifies when bookmakers disagree on a match result, allowing you to bet on all outcomes to make a profit regardless of the winner.
sports-arbitrage.context: Local bookmakers sometimes adjust their odds with a few seconds delay on the global market (Pinnacle/Bet365).
sports-arbitrage.challenge: The 'Smart Matching': Automatically reconcile entities named differently (e.g., 'Man. City' vs 'Manchester City FC') across heterogeneous data sources.
sports-arbitrage.solution: Modular Python Architecture: Direct API Scrapers (Reverse Engineering) -> Normalization Engine (Jaccard Similarity) -> Implied Probability Calculator.

smart-cv.title: Contextual CV Optimizer
smart-cv.shortDesc: Instantly adapt your CV to the job offer you are viewing.
smart-cv.fullDesc: A browser extension that rewrites your CV in real-time to perfectly match the job listing you're looking at. It analyzes the ad's keywords and rephrases your experience to maximize your chances of getting an interview.
smart-cv.context: Adapting your CV to each offer is essential but time-consuming. Generic candidates are filtered by ATS.
smart-cv.challenge: Orchestrate a complex AI pipeline (Extraction -> Enrichment -> Transposition -> PDF Rendering) directly in the browser without blocking the interface.
smart-cv.solution: Hybrid architecture with background.js state management. Injection of content scripts for scraping and client-side PDF generation via html2pdf.

ezlod.title: Automated Resale Bot
ezlod.shortDesc: From StockX to Vinted: Automated product listing creation.
ezlod.fullDesc: Simplify sneaker resale. Just enter a model name: the tool retrieves official data and photos from StockX, generates a professional montage, calculates market price, and automatically publishes the listing on Vinted and other platforms.
ezlod.context: Creating quality listings for sneaker resale is a repetitive and slow manual process (photos, description, pricing).
ezlod.challenge: Orchestrate the recovery of protected data (StockX GraphQL/360° Images) and automate publication on a closed platform (Vinted) without triggering security measures.
ezlod.solution: Hybrid Approach: API Scraping (GraphQL/HAR Analysis) for Data + Selenium/Requests for Vinted automation. Image processing engine (Pillow) to generate unique studio views.

seo-audit.title: Virtual SEO Expert
seo-audit.shortDesc: A complete diagnosis of your website to please Google.
seo-audit.fullDesc: This robot explores your site like Google does. It checks every page, every link, and every image to identify what is stopping your site from being first in search results. It delivers a detailed technical report to fix your errors.
seo-audit.context: Manual audits cannot cover the exhaustiveness of thousands of pages of a modern site.
seo-audit.challenge: Efficiently crawl dynamic web applications (SPA) without being blocked or impacting target server performance.
seo-audit.solution: Respectful Asynchronous Crawler (Polite Crawler) with headless JS rendering and graph analysis.

tcg-collector.title: Collection Manager
tcg-collector.shortDesc: Scan your cards, AI recognizes them and gives you their price.
tcg-collector.fullDesc: No more manual searching for the price of your Pokémon or Magic cards. Take a photo, and the application recognizes the exact card (even with reflections), gives you its current market value, and adds it to your digital collection.
tcg-collector.context: Manual management of thousands of physical cards is tedious and prone to entry errors.
tcg-collector.challenge: Precisely identify a card among thousands of visually similar variants (Reverse Holo, Full Art) from a simple smartphone photo.
tcg-collector.solution: Hybrid computer vision pipeline: Azure Cognitive Services for textual OCR + Perceptual hashing algorithm for exact image matching.

roi.title: Return on Investment (ROI) Calculator
roi.subtitle: Discover exactly how much your manual tasks are costing you and what automation can save you instantly.
roi.bot_work: Meanwhile, my automations would have processed:
